name: Honeypot Anti Spam for Forminator Forms
author: KGM Servizi

sections.description:
Don’t work? Open ticket, we answer in max 48h.

In order to function correctly, the user’s browser must have Javascript enabled!

I’m try a new solution for a better honeypot for Forminator Contact Form, Payment Form & Custom Form Builder. Spam protection, anti-spam for Forminator Forms.

You only have to activate the plugin to make it work on all forms.
Plugin add a new field (with js) on your forms and check if it exists or it is valorized.

To change the name of the honeypot input you will find a settings page under the WordPress tools menu.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress add plugins page directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ page in WordPress.
  3. Clean cache.
  4. You can found settings for randomize honeypot field name under tools.
sections.changelog:
0.2.1

  • Bugfix and readme update 6.4 compatibility

0.2

  • Protection log

0.1

  • Initial release
sections.reviews:
Made a huge difference so far!

By chocotaco on February 12, 2024

Even with both the built-in Honeypot and ReCaptcha enabled, I was getting a ton of spam in one of my Forminator Forms. It almost seemed like I started getting more spam after I turned the built-in Honeypot on.

It's been 24 hours now with this plugin and I haven't gotten a single spam email. Normal submissions are still getting through, and site speed hasn't been affected at all.

Thanks so much to the dev for turning this into a plugin!!
